    • Constructor Detail

      • Platform

        public Platform(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String name,
                boolean supportsDeployment,
                java.util.Set<PlatformInput> properties)
        Creates a new platform.
        Parameters:
        id - short identifier of platform. must match regex [a-z_-]+
        name - displayable name of platform. must not be an empty string
        supportsDeployment - set this to true if the plugin supports deployment within the TOSCAna Transformer
        properties - the properties the platform requires.

      • Platform

        public Platform(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.util.Set<PlatformInput> properties)
        Creates a new platform. Without deployment Support
        Parameters:
        id - short identifier of platform. must match regex [a-z_-]+
        name - displayable name of platform. must not be an empty string
        properties - the properties the platform requires.

      • Platform

        public Platform(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new platform. Used in case the platform does not require properties and does not Support in-app Deployments.
        Parameters:
        id - short identifier of platform
        name - displayable name of platform
        See Also:
        Platform(String, String, Set)

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Set<InputProperty> getProperties()
        Returns:
        a list of properties which are necessary for a transformation to this platform.
